pkgmetadata.longdescription: Cluster Origin-Destination Flow Data // Provides functionality for clustering origin-destination (OD) pairs, representing desire lines (or flows). This includes creating distance matrices between OD pairs and passing distance matrices to a clustering algorithm. See the academic paper Tao and Thill (2016) doi:10.1111/gean.12100 for more details on spatial clustering of flows. See the paper on delineating demand- responsive operating areas by Mahfouz et al. (2025) doi:10.1016/j.urbmob.2025.100135 for an example of how this package can be used to cluster flows for applied transportation research.
